import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const BlogSingle = (props) => { const id = "64d25f1d94fdccd56dcc2cc7"; console.log(id); const [blog, setBlog] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const url = "../blogs/" + id; console.log(url); fetch(url) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((blogDetail) => { console.log(blogDetail); setBlog(blogDetail); }); }, []); console.log(blog); const addComment = (event, blogId) => { const newComment = { name: "rajjo", email: "rajnish@gmail.com", comment: "this is a demo content", }; const id = blogId; console.log(id); const url = "../blogs/" + id + "/comments"; const requestOptions = { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(newComment), }; fetch(url, requestOptions) .then((response) => response.json()) .then(console.log("done")); window.location.reload(false); }; return ( <>
